title: Selena Gomez Just Wore the Elegant Shoe My Petite Colleague Says Looks Best With Wide-Leg Trousers
description: A combination to wear on repeat.
excerpt: Selena Gomez elevated her look by styling her wide-leg trousers with a sharp pointed-toe shoe in the same way my petite colleague recommends. See her look here.
text: Walking through the streets of New York, Selena Gomez styled the exact outfit combination that my petite colleague says she wears at least once a week.Starting with a pair of white trousers in a voluminous wide-leg cut, Gomez paired her look with black pointed-toe heels. Adding structure and height to her weekday outfit, Gomez's wide-leg trousers and pointed-toe shoe pairing was quickly flagged by my 5' 3" colleague Maxine Eggenberger, who told me that this is the exact shoe she reaches for whenever she wears a similar trouser style. Our team Slack chat was in unanimous agreement—not only is Gomez's look petite-friendly, but it's also one of the chicest outfits we've seen her in this season.(Image credit: Getty Images)"Whilst Selena might not technically fall into the petite height category (I believe she's 5' 5"), the fact she's styled her wide-leg trousers with the exact shoe I would also wear to balance out my frame when wearing wide-leg trousers is no accident," notes Eggenberger. "A pointed-toe shoe creates the illusion of extra length, and whilst I'm not fussed about looking taller, I do find the combination makes me look more in proportion when I'm wearing trousers with this level of volume."Cinching in her monochrome look with Khaite's Benny Belt, Gomez tapped into the revived studded belt trend in a chic and elevated way. Rather than looking a bit Y2K—as a studded belt easily can—Gomez's wide-leg trousers and sleek halterneck top kept her 'fit firmly rooted in 2024.Read on to shop the trouser and shoe combo that guarantees an elegant outfit at any height.SHOP SELENA GOMEZ'S WIDE-LEG TROUSER AND POINTED-TOE SHOE OUTFIT: Reformation Bowie Knit Top in Black This also comes in five other shades. This new-in pair from H&M went straight into my basket. Khaite Benny Studded Patent Leather Belt Fashion people can't get enough of Khaite's Benny Belt. Jimmy Choo Ixia 80 Black Nappa Leather Pumps The teardrop heel adds a sculptural edge to these elegant shoes. With Nothing Underneath Rampling These 100% wool trousers will keep you cosy well into winter. & Other Stories Wide Tailored Trousers Add a studded belt like Gomez. ME+EM Regular Length Forever Wide-Leg Tux Trouser I always come back to Me+Em for its elevated tailoring. Mango Wideleg Pleated Trousers in Black These come in UK sizes 4–22. The Frankie Shop Piper Pleated Twill Wide-Leg Pants SHOP POINTED-TOE SHOES: Arket Slingback Leather Pumps The glossy leather finish gives these such an elevated edge. H&M Pointed Slingback Court Shoes You can't argue with that price. Khaite River Crinkled-Leather Slingback Pumps in Merlot Such a gorgeous shade of deep red. Reformation Nickie Kitten Heeled Pump in Black Suede These also comes in two other shades. Saint Laurent Anja Leather Pumps Every great wardrobe starts with a classic black pump.
html:
Walking through the streets of New York, Selena Gomez styled the exact outfit combination that my petite colleague says she wears at least once a week.

Starting with a pair of white trousers in a voluminous wide-leg cut, Gomez paired her look with black pointed-toe heels. Adding structure and height to her weekday outfit, Gomez's wide-leg trousers and pointed-toe shoe pairing was quickly flagged by my 5' 3" colleague Maxine Eggenberger, who told me that this is the exact shoe she reaches for whenever she wears a similar trouser style. Our team Slack chat was in unanimous agreement—not only is Gomez's look petite-friendly, but it's also one of the chicest outfits we've seen her in this season.

"Whilst Selena might not technically fall into the petite height category (I believe she's 5' 5"), the fact she's styled her wide-leg trousers with the exact shoe I would also wear to balance out my frame when wearing wide-leg trousers is no accident," notes Eggenberger. "A pointed-toe shoe creates the illusion of extra length, and whilst I'm not fussed about looking taller, I do find the combination makes me look more in proportion when I'm wearing trousers with this level of volume."

Cinching in her monochrome look with Khaite's Benny Belt, Gomez tapped into the revived studded belt trend in a chic and elevated way. Rather than looking a bit Y2K—as a studded belt easily can—Gomez's wide-leg trousers and sleek halterneck top kept her 'fit firmly rooted in 2024.

Read on to shop the trouser and shoe combo that guarantees an elegant outfit at any height.

SHOP SELENA GOMEZ'S WIDE-LEG TROUSER AND POINTED-TOE SHOE OUTFIT:
